# Testing Docs

## Examples

- [C# example](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/unit-testing-csharp-with-mstest.md): Learn unit test concepts in C# and .NET through an interactive experience building a sample solution step-by-step using dotnet test and MSTest.
- [F# example](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/unit-testing-fsharp-with-mstest.md): Learn unit test concepts for F# in .NET Core through an interactive experience building a sample solution step-by-step using dotnet test and MSTest.
- [VB example](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/unit-testing-visual-basic-with-mstest.md): Learn unit test concepts in .NET Core through an interactive experience building a sample Visual Basic solution step-by-step using MSTest.

## Extensions

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/microsoft-testing-platform-extensions.md): Learn about the various Microsoft.Testing.Platform extensions and how to use them.
- [Code Coverage](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/microsoft-testing-platform-extensions-code-coverage.md): Learn about the various Microsoft.Testing.Platform Code Coverage extensions and how to use them.
- [Diagnostics](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/microsoft-testing-platform-extensions-diagnostics.md): Learn about the various Microsoft.Testing.Platform diagnostics extensions and how to use them.
- [Fakes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/microsoft-testing-platform-extensions-fakes.md): Learn about the various Microsoft.Testing.Platform Fakes extension capabilities and how to use it.
- [Hosting](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/microsoft-testing-platform-extensions-hosting.md): Learn about the various Microsoft.Testing.Platform hosting extensions and how to use them.
- [Output](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/microsoft-testing-platform-extensions-output.md): Learn about the various Microsoft.Testing.Platform output extensions and how to use them.
- [Policy](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/microsoft-testing-platform-extensions-policy.md): Learn about the various Microsoft.Testing.Platform policy extensions and how to use them.
- [Test Reports](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/microsoft-testing-platform-extensions-test-reports.md): Learn about the various Microsoft.Testing.Platform test reports extensions and how to use them.
- [VSTest Bridge](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/microsoft-testing-platform-extensions-vstest-bridge.md): Learn about the various Microsoft.Testing.Platform VSTest bridge extension and how to use it.

## Getting started

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/unit-testing-mstest-getting-started.md): Learn about how to install MSTest.
- [MSTest SDK](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/unit-testing-mstest-sdk.md): Learn about the MSTest.Sdk and how to configure profiles and extensions with MSBuild properties.

## Microsoft.Testing.Platform

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/microsoft-testing-platform-intro.md): Learn about Microsoft.Testing.Platform, a lightweight way to run tests without depending on the .NET SDK.
- [FAQ](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/microsoft-testing-platform-faq.md): Get answers to frequently asked questions about Microsoft.Testing.Platform.
- [Comparison with VSTest](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/microsoft-testing-platform-vs-vstest.md): Learn the differences between Microsoft.Testing.Platform and VSTest, such as namespaces, NuGet packages, and executables.
- [Migrate from VSTest to Microsoft.Testing.Platform](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/migrating-vstest-microsoft-testing-platform.md): Learn how to migrate from VSTest to Microsoft.Testing.Platform
- [Migrate from Microsoft.Testing.Platform v1 to v2](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/microsoft-testing-platform-migration-from-v1-to-v2.md): Learn how to migrate to Microsoft.Testing.Platform v2 and understand the key changes.
- [Configure the test platform](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/microsoft-testing-platform-config.md): Learn how to configure Microsoft.Testing.Platform using configuration settings.
- [Diagnostics overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/microsoft-testing-platform-diagnostics.md): Learn about the diagnostics in Microsoft.Testing.Platform.
- [Optional telemetry](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/microsoft-testing-platform-telemetry.md): Learn about the telemetry data collected by Microsoft.Testing.Platform and how to disable it.
- [Known exit codes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/microsoft-testing-platform-exit-codes.md): Learn about the various Microsoft.Testing.Platform exit codes and their meaning.
- [Integration with dotnet test](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/microsoft-testing-platform-integration-dotnet-test.md): Learn how to run Microsoft.Testing.Platform tests through dotnet test.

## Microsoft.Testing.Platform Architecture

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/microsoft-testing-platform-architecture.md): Learn about Microsoft.Testing.Platform architecture.
- [Capabilities](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/microsoft-testing-platform-architecture-capabilities.md): Learn about Microsoft.Testing.Platform capabilities concept.
- [Extensions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/microsoft-testing-platform-architecture-extensions.md): Learn about how to extend Microsoft.Testing.Platform.
- [Services](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/microsoft-testing-platform-architecture-services.md): Learn about the Microsoft.Testing.Platform available services.

## MSTest

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/unit-testing-mstest-intro.md): Learn about MSTest.
- [Migrate from MSTest v1 to v3](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/unit-testing-mstest-migration-from-v1-to-v3.md): Learn about migrating from legacy MSTest (MSTest v1) to latest MSTest (MSTest v3).
